RelatedSentence: Insurers and reinsurers have coped well so far with recent extreme weather events , according to a report released Monday by Standard & Poor 's Corp .
Insurers and reinsurers have coped well so far with recent extreme weather events , according to a report released Monday by Standard & Poor 's Corp .

A0: a report released Monday by Standard & Poor 's Corp.
RelatedSentence: The report said reinsurers generally have been able to manage the impact of the extreme weather events over the past two years because of their risk diversification , as well as their effective underwriting , risk management , and risk mitigation practices .
